description: Whip up dinner for the family quick smart with the help of Old El Paso Tortilla Pockets Kit and creamy Chobani Plain Greek Yogurt.
keywords: Chicken wrap,Quick & easy dinner,Chicken dishes,Jan Feb 2022,Chicken
name: Smoky Chicken Tortilla Pockets With Lime Yogurt Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 red capsicum, halved, deseeded, thinly sliced
420g black beans no added salt, rinsed, drained
380g Old El Paso Tortilla Pockets Kit Sweet & Smoky BBQ

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over high heat. Cook capsicum and chicken for 3 minutes, stirring, or until browned and cooked through. Add beans and seasoning (from kit) and cook for 2 minutes, stirring, or until coated and heated through.
Meanwhile, heat tortillas according to packet instructions. Juice half of a lime. Combine yogurt and lime juice in a small bowl. Season with pepper.
Cut remaining limes into wedges. Fill tortillas with chicken mixture, lettuce and salsa (from kit). Dollop over a little yogurt mixture. Serve with lime wedges and remaining yogurt mixture.
